name: tmp

0.0.13.name: tmp
0.0.13.description: A simple temporary file and directory creator for [node.js.][1]

scripts.test: npm run clean && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report none --print none --dir ./coverage/json -u exports -R test/*-test.js && istanbul report --root ./coverage/json html && istanbul report text-summary
